metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45285 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
[cmd/go: go get may unexpectedly fallback to insecure git]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.20 - 1.20.3-1ubuntu0.1~22.04.1
golang-1.20-go - 1.20.3-1ubuntu0.1~22.04.1
golang-1.20-src - 1.20.3-1ubuntu0.1~22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.20 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20.3-1ubuntu0.1~22.04.1').
